        Start a Nchecks application that communicate with an erlang server.
        Parameters:
        mbox - The jserver_nchecks mailbox
        nodeName - The name of the foreign node
        rubyDir - The ruby script dir
        utilsDir - The utils dir
        etcDir - The config dir
        stateServer - the state server address
        stateServerPort - the state server port
